alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 3:41AM PST until December 19 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM SATURDAY TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Washington Cascades. * WHEN...From 2 AM Saturday to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Washington Cascades
